thread.title: Terry hails Mourinho as ‘best manager’ for Chelsea
thread.title_full: Terry hails Mourinho as ‘best manager’ for Chelsea | The Financial Express

author: financialexpress.com
title: Terry hails Mourinho as ‘best manager’ for Chelsea
text:
Other Articles Atletico de Kolkata beat FC Goa 1-0 in ISL Sania Mirza-Martina Hingis cruise into China Open quarters India thrash New Zealand 3-1 to level Hockey Test series Chelsea skipper John Terry has described Jose Mourinho as the best manager for his club, saying he is the only one who can get them out of their current dreadful start to their Premier League season.
Chelsea have claimed only two wins from the eight games that they have played, including their recent 1-3 defeat to Southampton.
The 34-year-old admitted that his side is not in a familiar position right now, adding that they need to rediscover their hunger to improve their performances, Sport24 reported.
The defender also insisted his club stick together and with the manager, and get themselves out of this problem.
Chelsea are currently at 16th spot with eight points in the EPL table. They will next lock horns against Aston Villa on October 17.
First Published on October 05, 2015 12:59 pm
